title: Funny Little Monsters
overview: The story so far…Using the latest advances in technology, including directly hot wiring the brains of the nation's children to a state of the art neural network of high performance machine learning computers, was just not possible.So, we asked them to draw a picture.On a piece of actual paper. Of a Funny Little Monster. From their imagination.We asked about their monster. We asked about them.We threw it in an airfryer for 20 minutes at 206° and this is what came out…
